text: so i finally got back to this. interesting — i overlooked that the module (parent theme) was already on the page when i created the child theme, so that makes sense that it didn’t update. BUT, when i added a new instance of the module to the page, dragging and dropping it in the CMS, it picked up the child theme, _and so did the original module_.
if i removed the new module from the page in the CMS, the original went back to parent styling.

that’s kind of troubling. if i’m already using a theme and want to create a child theme off of it for changes to one or more modules, it looks like that means re-creating all instances of that module — or putting another instance of the module on the page and hiding it, which is hacky horrible.
